ygData.subject: RE: A little drum data
ygData.msgSnippet: i changed my mind, don t much of an ego boost for you =P and an ego drop for me too hehe. actually i bet john kim knows at what points selo s becomes faster,
ygData.messageBody:
i changed my mind, don't much of an ego boost for you =P
and an ego drop for me too hehe.

actually i bet john kim knows at what points selo's becomes faster, whether
based on level, percussion skill, or both. i am pretty sure level comes
into it because a 50 bard is definitely faster than a 41 bard both with
maxxed percussion.

Shada

> Shada says she'll race me and we can see what the difference
> is between 47+Selo's
> drum and 50+MM drum. I want to leave her in the dust! (LOL Shada).
>
>
> Maravana Vireo
> Jus Divinum
> Mithaniel Marr
